description: SecurityPolicySpec defines the desired state of SecurityPolicy.

apiKeyAuth.description: APIKeyAuth defines the configuration for the API Key Authentication.

basicAuth.description: BasicAuth defines the configuration for the HTTP Basic Authentication.

cors.description: CORS defines the configuration for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS).

extAuth.description: ExtAuth defines the configuration for External Authorization.

jwt.description: JWT defines the configuration for JSON Web Token (JWT) authentication.

oidc.description: OIDC defines the configuration for the OpenID Connect (OIDC) authentication.
